title: Russia Just Accused The NSA Of A Massive Hack...
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at what appears to be another massive hack that's been ranging for nearly 4 years uninterrupted for iOS users. Russia's FSB accused the NSA yesterday of spying on their top officials for years using insane zero-day exploits only available from their words through the help of Apple. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!

Check out the newest podcast episode: https://youtu.be/tg7gjHJvxtI
